label: uncl4043
comment: Code identifying the class of trade.

values.label: Financial service provider
values.comment: A manager of money or other assets.

values.label: Importer
values.comment: A person or group that imports goods or services.

values.label: Vendor
values.comment: A person or group selling goods or services.

values.label: Exporter
values.comment: A person or group who sends goods or services to a foreign country.

values.label: Contractor
values.comment: A person or group acting as a contractor.

values.label: Agency
values.comment: A party or group that acts as an agent on behalf of another party.

values.label: Buying group
values.comment: A temporary group of buyers formed for purchasing purposes.

values.label: Broker
values.comment: A person or group acting as an agent for others, accepting responsibility in return for a fee.

values.label: Consolidator (master distributor)
values.comment: A person or group acting as a clearing house for goods or services.

values.label: Dealer
values.comment: A person or group buying directly from a manufacturer for resale.

values.label: Distributor
values.comment: A person or group acting explicitly as distributor of merchandise or goods.

values.label: Jobber
values.comment: A person or group buying merchandise to resell it to a retailer.

values.label: Manufacturer
values.comment: A company that produces goods from raw materials.

values.label: OEM (Original equipment manufacturer)
values.comment: A manufacturer selling its goods to a company reselling them using own labels.

values.label: Resale
values.comment: A class of trade where goods and/or services are purchased for resale.

values.label: Retailer
values.comment: A person selling goods or services in small quantities or by the piece.

values.label: Stationer
values.comment: The trade has a classification of stationer.

values.label: Wholesaler
values.comment: A person or group buying goods in large quantities for resale by a retailer.

values.label: User
values.comment: Identifies the end-user of goods or services.

values.label: Out patient
values.comment: A patient not under the full time care of a hospital but visits from time to time for treatment.

values.label: In patient
values.comment: A patient under the full time care of a hospital.

values.label: Electricity exchange
values.comment: Identifies the exchange where the intermediaries sell and buy electricity.
